snippet: Airport guide apps can connect you with decent food, and may help you avoid overpaying for ground transportation.
abstract: Bob Tedeschi App Smart column highlights airport guide apps; notes they can connect the user with decent food, and may help one avoid overpaying for ground transportation. Photos (M)
lead_paragraph: As many times as I've seen an airport vendor selling a tired-looking sandwich for $10, I'm still dumbstruck. I'll often circle the terminal for 20 minutes, starved and incredulous, before ending up with that miserable sandwich because it's the least worst option. Next time I might be able to save some steps, and possibly some money, by using an airport guide app. In addition to helping find food vendors and shops that may not rip you off, the apps can help you avoid overpaying for ground transportation once you reach your destination.

headline.main: After Your Airplane Lands, an App Comes In Handy
